messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On December 22, DET. A. L. Whitman was dispatched to the Greenwood Mall following a reported disturbance. Key informants were Mrs. Rodriguez, a store owner, and Mr. Lane, a security guard. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. H. N. Fischer - OPERATIONS Det. Whitman, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS PARKER 21:07 Disturbance Mrs. Rodriguez described a group of teenagers causing chaos in her store, while Mr. Lane mentioned confronting them earlier for suspicious activities. Foot. Technician Neil processed the scene for any potential evidence. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Whitman Sr OPERATIONS Lt. Fischer INFORMANT Lane, Thomas 47 Cedar Street, Greenfield, Oregon 123-412. 90822. PARKER 21:07 Disturbance At 7:10 PM, Detective Whitman and Lieutenant Fischer consolidated witness accounts. Captain D. R. Stone provided additional patrol units for the evening. Sergeant W. K. Bennett will be reviewing mall security footage for identification. By 8:00 PM, all reports, including a list of damaged items, were compiled. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Whitman Sr Lt. Fischer AFFIDAVIT - Incident Report 1) Security Footage 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Damage Assessment 5) Mall Entry Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE G. Mitchell G.P.D. 5.45 P20 0782 Rodriguez, ANNA NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 55-1014 DETECTIVE: A. WHITMAN ITEM: 20-4208- 82 CRIME: 21:07 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 80725 - CONFIRMED Jane Smith DATE 6/25/22 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. A. L. Whitman  Officer Context: On December 22, DET. A. L. Whitman was dispatched to the Greenwood Mall following a reported disturbance. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. H. N. Fischer  Officer Context: Lt. H. N. Fischer - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Technician Neil  Officer Context: Foot. Technician Neil processed the scene for any potential evidence. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Whitman  Officer Context: At 7:10 PM, Detective Whitman and Lieutenant Fischer consolidated witness accounts. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain D. R. Stone  Officer Context: Captain D. R. Stone provided additional patrol units for the evening. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant W. K. Bennett  Officer Context: Sergeant W. K. Bennett will be reviewing mall security footage for identification. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Lieutenant Fischer  Officer Context: At 7:10 PM, Detective Whitman and Lieutenant Fischer consolidated witness accounts. Officer Role: Lieutenant
